text.text_translated:
Campbell says the hero first says no to the call to adventure. Then a guide appears. The guide helps the hero cross the threshold. The hero enters the special world. In that world the hero faces many tests. The hero meets friends. The friends are Han Solo, R2D2 and C3PO. The hero also fights a bad guy. The bad guy is Darth Vader. The special world is the Death Star. The hero gets ready for the biggest challenge.

In Star Wars the hero is Luke. Obi‑Wan is the guide. Obi‑Wan helps Luke. Han Solo, R2D2 and C3PO are Luke’s friends. Darth Vader is the bad guy. The special world is the Death Star.
